about_the_game:
Motion Soccer PRO offers a new way to experience football in virtual reality. Here, you don’t just play a match; you feel it, create it your way, and live it in first-person, third-person, or through a tactical mixed-reality view. All in one game, with the freedom to switch between styles whenever you want.



  • Tactical View (Mixed Reality):
    Imagine placing a miniature football field right in front of you, in your living room or space. Here, you decide your level of involvement in the match. Prefer to observe and let the team play on its own? Or take on the role of coach, adjusting tactics and formations? You can even move players with your hand to direct passes, runs, and shots. For a more classic approach, use the joysticks and aim with your head or controller. In this view, strategy, creativity, and interaction with your real surroundings come together for a unique experience.


  • Third-Person View:
    If you’re looking for something more familiar, the third-person view offers classic control of a football simulator but with the immersion of virtual reality. Use the joystick to move players, make precise passes, and shoot on goal with the depth and atmosphere only VR can deliver.


  • First-Person View:
    Step onto the pitch as if you were a player. Choose the traditional mode, where you move the footballer with the joystick and aim with your head or controller for natural shots. Every action, from headers to tackles, feels authentic. Want more of a challenge? Activate Expert Mode and control the player’s feet directly with your hand movements. No other method brings football to life like this.




Content, Customization, and Progression:
Motion Soccer PRO features 100 teams: 50 clubs and 50 national teams, all inspired by the world’s best squads. Invest match earnings to improve players, tweak skills, and refine your style. Adjust lineups, design strategies, and personalize player names and aesthetics to build your dream team.



Game Modes and Constant Challenges:
There’s always something to do in Motion Soccer. Play friendly matches between clubs and national teams, compete in 5 knockout-style tournaments, and relive iconic football moments in Story Mode. Plus, 18 specific training drills let you perfect every aspect of the game, from free kicks to dribbling, counterattacks, and goalkeeping. Each goal, victory, and achievement helps you climb the ranking system, unlock achievements, and earn your place on the leaderboards.



Football Your Way:
Motion Soccer PRO is not just a game; it’s a universe of football possibilities tailored to your preferences. Switch views on the fly, alternate control methods, experiment with new tactics, and enjoy a truly personalized experience. Are you ready to hit the pitch and reinvent the way you play football?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Oculus headsets (meta quest and rift) and valve index.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Oculus headsets (meta quest and rift) and valve index.

short_description: Motion Soccer PRO immerses you in 11v11 matches that you'll experience in a whole new way thanks to Virtual Reality: control the game from an aerial view, play in first person with classic controls, or use real movement to control the player's feet. Get ready to dominate the field!
